snippet: Dr. Deborah Birx, a former chief for global AIDS for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, was sworn in on Friday as the nation’s global AIDS coordinator.
abstract: Dr Deborah Birx, former chief for global AIDS for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, is sworn in as nation’s global AIDS coordinator; will be in charge of the President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Deborah Birx, a former chief for global AIDS for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, was sworn in on Friday as the nation’s global AIDS coordinator.

headline.main: New Global Aids Chief for U.S. Assumes Post
headline.print_headline: New Global AIDS Chief for U.S. Assumes Post
